text: Oras Oy is a Finnish manufacturer of bathroom and kitchen faucets. It is in Rauma. It was established in 1945. In 2012, there were 920 workers. Oras is the fourth-largest manufacturer of faucets in Europe. It makes 30â€“80% of the faucets in Finland. == References == == Other websites == *Company's homepage Category:Companies of Finland Category:1945 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Finland
title: Oras (company)
